3.1. Orientation¶

  1. Open the command prompt on the Windows jumpbox execute and the following command:

    dig www.example.com. Examine the output, and notice that an A record exists.

  2. Open Internet Explorer and access www.example.com. Note that you accessed a web server in site1.

    TODO Create content server page and add screenshot

  3. RDP to the domain controller using: EXAMPLE\user, password Agility1.

    Start –> Remote Desktop Connection –> 10.1.70.200.

  4. Click on Server Manager, and in the top right corner choose Tools and then DNS.

  5. Double click on EXAMPLE.COM and examine DNS records.

  6. Connect to https://bigip1.site1.example.com and list the virtual server (203.0.113.9).

  7. Connect to https://bigip1.site2.example.com and list the virtual servers (198.51.100.41).
